professional_summary: Experienced Oracle and MySQL DBA with expertise in database administration, performance tuning, and DR solutions. Proficient in RAC, Data Guard, and enterprise-level monitoring tools.

key_responsibilities: Administering and monitoring Oracle databases in production and development environments.
Performing regular maintenance tasks such as backup
Optimizing database performance through tuning queries and indexing.
Troubleshooting MySQL database issues and resolving server problems.
Creating scripts for data integration and maintenance.
Designing efficient database structures for customer analysis.

technical_skills:
Oracle Database Administration",
            "MySQL Database Management",
            "Database Performance Tuning",
            "RAC and Data Guard Configuration",
            "Enterprise Monitoring Tools (OEM Grid Control)",
            "SQL Query Optimization",
            "Incident Handling and Problem Resolution
tools_and_software:
Oracle Server Software",
            "MySQL Server",
            "WebLogic Server Administration Console",
            "RMAN for Backup and Recovery",
            "Shell Scripting for Automation
